sentences: William Winant (born 1953) is an American percussionist.
He received a Foundation for Contemporary Arts Grants to Artists award (2016).
He later received an undergraduate degree from York University before pursuing graduate work at Mills College in Oakland, California, where he is currently a faculty member.
1995 - Musical Outsiders: An American Legacy - Harry Partch, Lou Harrison, and Terry Riley.
